[30;1m52 | [0m[35m	that the aggregate cost of stencil clears is reduced by a factor of[0m
[30;1m53 | [0m[35m	1/(2^n) where n is the number of bits devoted to the stencil tag.[0m

[30;1m7 | [0m[35mOverview (from the spec)[0m
[30;1m8 | [0m[35m	[0m
[30;1m9 | [0m[35m	NV_conservative_raster_pre_snap_triangles provides a new mode to achieve[0m
[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	rasterization of triangles that is conservative w.r.t the triangle at [0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	infinite precision i.e. before it is snapped to the sub-pixel grid.  This[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m	extension provides a new mode that expands this functionality to lines and [0m
[30;1m13 | [0m[35m	points.[0m

[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	without depth-buffering artifacts.  This is accomplished by generating[0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	the depth values for all the primitives from a single ``reference plane''[0m

[30;1m30 | [0m[35m	or provided with the mesh by the authoring tool or content pipeline. It will[0m

[30;1m9 | [0m[35m	The goal of this extension is to permit extremely high vertex[0m
[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	processing rates via OpenGL vertex arrays even when the CPU lacks[0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	the necessary data movement bandwidth to keep up with the rate[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m	at which the vertex engine can consume vertices.  CPUs can keep[0m
[30;1m13 | [0m[35m	up if they can just pass vertex indices to the hardware and[0m
[30;1m14 | [0m[35m	let the hardware "pull" the actual vertex data via Direct Memory[0m
[30;1m15 | [0m[35m	Access (DMA).  Unfortunately, the current OpenGL 1.1 vertex array[0m

[30;1m33 | [0m[35m	array data may access the changed data, and a call that follows[0m
[30;1m34 | [0m[35m	a change to array data may access the original data."[0m
[30;1m35 | [0m[35m	[0m
[30;1m36 | [0m[35m	This means that by the time End returns (and DrawArrays and[0m
[30;1m37 | [0m[35m	DrawElements return since they have implicit Ends), the actual vertex[0m
[30;1m38 | [0m[35m	array data must be transferred to OpenGL.  This strict coherency model[0m
[30;1m39 | [0m[35m	prevents us from simply passing vertex element indices to the hardware[0m

[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	to the OpenGL ES primitive processing pipeline.  These pipeline stages[0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	operate on a new basic primitive type, called a patch.  A patch consists[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m	of a fixed-size collection of vertices, each with per-vertex attributes,[0m
[30;1m13 | [0m[35m	plus a number of associated per-patch attributes.  Tessellation control[0m
[30;1m14 | [0m[35m	shaders transform an input patch specified by the application, computing[0m
[30;1m15 | [0m[35m	per-vertex and per-patch attributes for a new output patch.  A[0m
[30;1m16 | [0m[35m	fixed-function tessellation primitive generator subdivides the patch, and[0m

[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	workload and bandwidth by reducing the average resolution of a render target.[0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	Perceived image quality is kept high by leaving the focal point of[0m

[30;1m9 | [0m[35m	OpenGL evaluators provide applications with the capability to[0m
[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	specify polynomial or rational curves and surfaces using control[0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	points relative to the Bezier basis.  The curves and surfaces are[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m	then drawn by evaluating the polynomials provided at various values[0m
[30;1m13 | [0m[35m	for the u parameter of a curve or the (u,v) parameters of a surface.[0m
[30;1m14 | [0m[35m	A tensor product formulation is used for the surfaces.[0m
[30;1m15 | [0m[35m	[0m

[30;1m7 | [0m[35mOverview (from the spec)[0m
[30;1m8 | [0m[35m	[0m
[30;1m9 | [0m[35m	OpenGL evaluators provide applications with the capability to[0m
[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	specify polynomial or rational curves and surfaces using control[0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	points relative to the Bezier basis.  The curves and surfaces are[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m	then drawn by evaluating the polynomials provided at various values[0m
[30;1m13 | [0m[35m	for the u parameter of a curve or the (u,v) parameters of a surface.[0m
[30;1m14 | [0m[35m	A tensor product formulation is used for the surfaces.[0m

[30;1m9 | [0m[35m	The goal of this extension is to permit extremely high vertex[0m
[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	processing rates via OpenGL vertex arrays even when the CPU lacks[0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	the necessary data movement bandwidth to keep up with the rate[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m	at which the vertex engine can consume vertices.  CPUs can keep[0m
[30;1m13 | [0m[35m	up if they can just pass vertex indices to the hardware and[0m
[30;1m14 | [0m[35m	let the hardware "pull" the actual vertex data via Direct Memory[0m
[30;1m15 | [0m[35m	Access (DMA).  Unfortunately, the current OpenGL 1.1 vertex array[0m

[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	sample all primitives multiple times at each pixel.  The color[0m

[30;1m42 | [0m[35m	such as rendering other parts of the scene or performing other[0m
[30;1m43 | [0m[35m	computations on the CPU.[0m

[30;1m14 | [0m[35m	specified, the upsampling is performed via one of two methods:[0m
[30;1m15 | [0m[35m	RESAMPLE_REPLICATE_SGIX, RESAMPLE_ZERO_FILL_SGIX.[0m
[30;1m16 | [0m[35m	Replicate and zero fill are provided to[0m
[30;1m17 | [0m[35m	give the application greatest performance and control over the[0m
[30;1m18 | [0m[35m	filtering process.[0m

[30;1m9 | [0m[35m	The extension ARB_depth_clamp introduced the ability to control[0m
[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	the clamping of the depth value for both the near and far plane.[0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	One limitation is that the control was for both planes at the[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m	same time; some applications can benefit from having clamping[0m
[30;1m13 | [0m[35m	enabled for only one of the two planes, in order to save[0m
[30;1m14 | [0m[35m	fillrate for the other plane by clipping the geometry.[0m

[30;1m8 | [0m[35m	[0m
[30;1m9 | [0m[35m	The extension ARB_depth_clamp introduced the ability to control[0m
[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	the clamping of the depth value for both the near and far plane.[0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	One limitation is that the control was for both planes at the[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m	same time; some applications can benefit from having clamping[0m
[30;1m13 | [0m[35m	enabled for only one of the two planes, in order to save[0m
[30;1m14 | [0m[35m	fillrate for the other plane by clipping the geometry.[0m

[30;1m13 | [0m[35m	Asynchronous commands have two properties:[0m

[30;1m7 | [0m[35mOverview (from the spec)[0m
[30;1m8 | [0m[35m	[0m
[30;1m9 | [0m[35m	This extension introduces a method for culling vertexes in object[0m
[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	space based on the value of the dot product between the normal at[0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	the vertex and a culling eye direction.[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m	[0m
[30;1m13 | [0m[35m	Culling a polygon by examining its vertexes in object space can be[0m
[30;1m14 | [0m[35m	more efficient than screen space polygon culling since the transformation[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m648[0m[34m of [0m[33m1133[0m[31m ]--[0m
   Rule Id: [34mBD000610[0m
       Tag: [34mSecurity.Backdoor.LOLBAS.Linux[0m
  Severity: [36mModerate[0m, Confidence: [36mLow[0m
  Filename: [33m/pyopengl-3.1.9/OpenGL/GL/EXT/cull_vertex.py[0m
   Pattern: [32m\s(apt|apt\-get|aria2c|arp|ash|awk|base64|bash|bpftrace|busybox|cat|chmod|chown|cp|cpan|cpulimit|crontab|csh|curl|cut|dash|dd|diff|dmesg|dmsetup|dnf|docker|dpkg|easy_install|ed|emacs|env|expand|expect|facter|find|finger|flock|fmt|ftp|gawk|gdb|gimp|git|grep|head|iftop|ionice|ip|irb|jjs|journalctl|jrunscript|ksh|ld\.so|ldconfig|logsave|ltrace|lua|mail|mawk|mount|mtr|mv|mysql|nano|nawk|nc|nice|nl|nmap|node|od|openssl|perl|pg|php|pic|pico|pip|puppet|readelf|red|rlogin|rlwrap|rpm|rpmquery|rsync|ruby|run\-mailcap|run\-parts|rvim|scp|screen|script|sed|service|setarch|sftp|shuf|smbclient|socat|sort|sqlite3|ssh|start\-stop\-daemon|stdbuf|strace|systemctl|tail|tar|taskset|tclsh|tcpdump|tee|telnet|tftp|time|timeout|tmux|top|ul|unexpand|uniq|unshare|vi|vim|watch|wget|whois|wish|xargs|xxd|yum|zsh|zypper)\s[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m	[0m
[30;1m13 | [0m[35m	Culling a polygon by examining its vertexes in object space can be[0m
[30;1m14 | [0m[35m	more efficient than screen space polygon culling since the transformation[0m
[30;1m15 | [0m[35m	to screen space (which may include a division by w) can be avoided for[0m
[30;1m16 | [0m[35m	culled vertexes.  Also, vertex culling can be computed before vertexes[0m
[30;1m17 | [0m[35m	are assembled into primitives.  This is a useful property when drawing[0m
[30;1m18 | [0m[35m	meshes with shared vertexes, since a vertex can be culled once, and the[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m649[0m[34m of [0m[33m1133[0m[31m ]--[0m
   Rule Id: [34mBD000610[0m
       Tag: [34mSecurity.Backdoor.LOLBAS.Linux[0m

[30;1m7 | [0m[35mOverview (from the spec)[0m
[30;1m8 | [0m[35m	[0m
[30;1m9 | [0m[35m	    This extension allows the specification of screen coordinate vertex[0m
[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	    data. Screen coordinate vertices completely bypass transformation,[0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	    texture generation, lighting and frustum clipping. It also allow for[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m	    fewer floating point computations to the performed by OpenGL.[0m

[30;1m80 | [0m[35m	command is issued in these cases, ensuring all access to the texture by[0m

[30;1m83 | [0m[35m	very possibly display texel anomalies at run time.  System level memory[0m

[30;1m85 | [0m[35m	Consider in any case, that GL has an alias of the base pointer for this[0m
[30;1m86 | [0m[35m	block of texture memory which is maintained until GL is finished rendering[0m

[30;1m7 | [0m[35mOverview (from the spec)[0m

[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	provided by NV_conservative_raster. It provides a new control to generate [0m

[30;1m24 | [0m[35m	By the time that any pixel operation that reads data from user memory[0m

[30;1m7 | [0m[35mOverview (from the spec)[0m
[30;1m8 | [0m[35m	[0m
[30;1m9 | [0m[35m	This extension defines 1 and 2 dimensional convolution operations[0m
[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	at a fixed location in the pixel transfer process.  Thus pixel drawing,[0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	reading, and copying, as well as texture image definition, are all[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m	candidates for convolution.  The convolution kernels are themselves[0m
[30;1m13 | [0m[35m	treated as 1 and 2 dimensional images, which can be loaded from[0m

[30;1m25 | [0m[35m	[0m
[30;1m26 | [0m[35m	This extension defines a mechanism for the application to mark the[0m
[30;1m27 | [0m[35m	storage of OpenGL objects as "purgeable" in order to influence these[0m
[30;1m28 | [0m[35m	paging operations.  The application can further control the[0m
[30;1m29 | [0m[35m	semantics of making object storage "purgeable" with two options[0m
[30;1m30 | [0m[35m	("volatile" and "released") and "unpurgeable" with two options[0m
[30;1m31 | [0m[35m	("undefined" and "retained")[0m

[30;1m9 | [0m[35m	NV_conservative_raster_pre_snap_triangles provides a new mode to achieve[0m
[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	rasterization of triangles that is conservative w.r.t the triangle at [0m

[30;1m10 | [0m[35m	pipeline before rasterization is the viewport transformation. This stage[0m

[30;1m47 | [0m[35m	  interface makes it nearly impossible to pipeline this operation.[0m
[30;1m48 | [0m[35m	  The driver will typically send the hardware a readback command[0m
[30;1m49 | [0m[35m	  when ReadPixels is called, and then wait for all of the data to[0m
[30;1m50 | [0m[35m	  be available before returning control to the application.  Then,[0m

[30;1m11 | [0m[35m	or 3D lookup into a 1D, 2D, or 3D texture image, the texture is a[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m	set of six 2D images representing the faces of a cube.  The (s,t,r)[0m
[30;1m13 | [0m[35m	texture coordinates are treated as a direction vector emanating from[0m
[30;1m14 | [0m[35m	the center of a cube.  At texture generation time, the interpolated[0m
[30;1m15 | [0m[35m	per-fragment (s,t,r) selects one cube face 2D image based on the[0m
[30;1m16 | [0m[35m	largest magnitude coordinate (the major axis).  A new 2D (s,t) is[0m
[30;1m17 | [0m[35m	calculated by dividing the two other coordinates (the minor axes[0m
